title: Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: Best Of The Herd
description:
Colin analyzes some of the performances from the first week of the NFL preseason and why it's obvious Kyle Shanahan is a much better coach than Matt LaFleur. He praises the Steelers for their ability to draft great offensive players and why Kenny Pickett is looking like their quarterback of the future. He also tells you why he was Right about the Cowboys and wrong about Baker Mayfield. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Bucky Brooks joins the show to talk about the Cowboys struggles and the QB competition with the Panthers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
